website_summaries.verdict: We love its sleek design and fast installation process. However, it's not the best option for the heaviest of TVs.
pros: Supports a load of 88 pounds with minimal bulk
cons: TVs near the weight capacity may cause the entire unit to tilt down

website_summaries.verdict: We love its sleek design and fast installation process, but we recommend the Cheetah instead.
pros: Ultra-slim material and low profile design minimizes bulk while fully supporting loads up to 88 pounds
cons: TVs near this mount's capacity may cause the entire unit to tilt down

customer_reviews.title: Is not big enough for my 52" Samsung LN52A630M1F
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit my Samsung 52" Television, purchased in 2008. Model LN52A630M1F. Whole contraption seems nicely designed, but it doesn't contain "wings" long enough to fit my VESA holes. Description clearly states it fits Samsung, clearly states that it fits up to 55", and clearly states VESA 15 max. Unfortunately, I can figure out Samsung, figure out 55", but VESA is a measurement that, even though I've got the television disassembled and ready to hang, I still don't know how to measure. Seems like company might offer longer wings, except that included information has no contact information for the manufacturer. Too wise, too late.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Coward

customer_reviews.title: This Product is Very Difficult to Install
customer_reviews.text: With all due respect to Amazon and the manufacturer, the wall mount for a flat screen TV is very difficult to install, primarily because someone needs to hold the TV and guide it into place, blind sided, while another person has to be ready to drop a bolt into two brackets . If you are a guy and trying to do it by yourself, it isn't going to happen. If you are a lady trying to do it by yourself, probably best to spend the 100 bucks to get it professionally installed. Better yet, don't buy this one. Get one that is easy for one person to put in unassisted. I asked permission to send back the one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: William S. Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and does what it's designed to do
customer_reviews.text: This was a simple Mount that I was able to accomplish myself without assistance It is NOT universal. the instructions are horrible to understand however I was able to find a YouTube video that I hope to be with the assembly in mounting I had to do some retrofitting for a 21 inch TV that I purchase is for. The range of motion and took control features on this is very nice. It seems to be pretty sturdy. I would purchase it again however I would definitely stick to using this to mount TVs that are smaller
customer_reviews.author: Jazzygirl719

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Bought to mount a smaller 32" tv with VESA 200x100. Although the mount says it works with this size, it's not intuitive at all. Had to jerry rig the parts and pieces together to make it work. Also, the way the tv attaches to the wall mount part is with thumb turn screws. It is impossible to get these tight enough to prevent the tv from wobbling/getting out of level with moving it around on the mount. I'll be going to Home Depot to buy nuts and washers to replace this poor design. All in all, an average product in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this for over a year, but my Vizio 32" needed smaller screws
customer_reviews.text: I've had my 55" on this bracket since March 21, 2015, and just hung a 32" on the same exact bracket. Quite satisfied. One caveat. My Vizio D32hn-D0 needed 4mm screws and the smallest of the 5 sizes that came with the bracket were too big (probably 5mm) so I took the entire TV down to the hardware store to try various screws to get the job done. I could have looked in the full user manual (not just the quick start) which tells me it needs M4 screws. So if your TV needs M4s, you'll need to get those separately. (To be fair to VonHaus, they're dinky little screws, I think Vizio should have gone larger.)
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Very unstable mount
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking unit but as I've read in other reviews the tilt bolt leaves a lot to be desired. Our 50" flat screen is well below the weight maximum, but tv is so unstable I'm afraid to touch it. Will be replacing very shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wall mount for 39 inch Magnavox LCD
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good articulation and very sturdy with a 39" magnavox. Mounted it in our master bedroom. Be careful when reading the installation instructions because I accidently drilled the pilot holes with the 3/8 drill bit instead of the 3/16 bit. I didn't realize at first that was the size for concrete walls so I redrilled the correct size right above the previous holes and everything went smooth from there. Good price for the quality. I'm buying another for my daughters room now that I know what I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: parkerlouis13

customer_reviews.title: Best wall mount...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wall mount after researching and found that it held up to 88 lbs. as opposed to the other ones I've seen that only held up to 66 lbs. It fit our heavy 55 inch tv perfectly. It was so easy to assemble and mount up on the wall. My son did it for me and I only had to help hold the tv while he screwed the tv onto the mount. It can swivel side to side and it also tilts down if you want to watch tv laying down. The mount itself is very strong and sturdy and the price was amazing, only $25! I love it and am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeemom

customer_reviews.title: Light but strong.
customer_reviews.text: This support is perfect for my 40 inch tv, mounted in a gazebo. I think it has enough accessories that it will mount about any tv. It is light, but strong. I missed the special sale, but it is worth the standard price.
customer_reviews.author: midcarol1

customer_reviews.title: A little tilty -- not in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I don't regret this purchase at all. I do notice that the balance is not spectacular. There doesn't seem to be a way to lock the screen into being level, so if you're OCD and you'll adjust it frequently -- you might consider spending a little more so that you're not fussing over the 1-3CM tilt. It has a nut on the back that is meant to be adjusted by hand, but it's as tight as I can get it and it doesn't prevent the balance from getting messed up every time I adjust the TV.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sanchelli

customer_reviews.title: ... Articulating 26" to 55" --> This is inexpensive and sturdy for my 40 inch Samsung flatscreen
customer_reviews.text: VonHaus Ultra Slim Cantilever Articulating 26" to 55" --> This is inexpensive and sturdy for my 40 inch Samsung flatscreen. I didn't need the extra metal "wings" that attach to the metal square tv attachment. It tilts perfectly fine for me. Although if someone mounts their tv higher than 8 feet one may want it to tilt more. Otherwise, this is great and perfect for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: thaddeus

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I believe we have a 46" TV ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I believe we have a 46" TV on it and its perfect! Now we can watch TV while we cook or do dishes. It comes out about a foot? I'm not sure, but it's able retract back nice and snug about 4 inches from the wall. It was definitely more useful than my previous mount that only tilted up and down. I had a couple of my friends set it up while I was at work so I'm unsure of the overall procedure of the installation but they did say this was much simpler than the other one i had.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: That was easy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mount! It was the exact fit for my 43" 4k UHD TV. I didn't even have to use the extenders. It fit like a glove! I also love how easily I can adjust it to get the most out of my entertainment experience. Highly recommended, sturdy and extremely affordable. I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Jakers

customer_reviews.title: Easy Installation and Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best deal and efficient tv mount available. It's very simple to install because they offer a great pictorial step by step diagram. You'll only need a second person to assist when your doing the final installation, unless you have a small tv you're mounting. If you need to mount on brick or concrete this company also provides hardware just for that. To utilize the mounted tv simply pull away from wall and swing left or right as needed. You can return the tv to a flat position on the wall when you want to retire from viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Bbqsmoke

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid hardware
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I wasn't able to use a 2 or 3 stud based wall mount and this seems to be a good solution. Very well made mount that seems like it would be much more expensive than it is. Installation was easy with excellent included variety of screws and bolts. The manual is sufficient but could have larger images and clearer text. The knobs used to hold and adjust the mount to the arm seem a little small; larger knobs with grips might be better. Pros: Heavyweight, well made, ample screw holes for studs, high quality screws and washers included Cons: Instruction manual, adjustment knobs are small
customer_reviews.author: Loop Seven

customer_reviews.title: Great wall mount for my Insigna 39" HDTV
customer_reviews.text: I wanted bo mount a mid-size TV in the upper-corner of our master bedroom. This worked PERFECTLY. This is a very sturdy, versitile mount, and will accomidate most TV's easily. This uses 4 heavy lag screws you drive into a stud. Use a stud-finder to carefully center the bracket, as the top-two are slightly staggered. Mine went in perfectly, but that might be tricky for some folks...just go slowly, and 'measure twice, drill once.' VERY SATISFIED with this build quality! It looks nice too...very sleek. My had a 200x200 pattern on the TV, so I didn't even use the wings. I am considering adding a sound bar under the TV, and have no fear of adding the weight. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: The Givenator

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective speaker attachment
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, didn't use the extension arms. Put them on my large speakers to hang them on the wall. About 1/4th the cost of speaker hangers. Did I say my speakers were heavy? How about 12 inch woofers. The only drawback is that the center of gravity for a speaker is much further forward and the vertical tilt portion wasn't designed with that in mind. I had to wedge a piece of metal in that part once I had them at the right angle to keep them there, because the torque was no match for the tilt mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Wilton

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Sturdy mount.
customer_reviews.text: I hung my 55" LG LED Tv on this mount. It swivels with ease and holds strong on the wall. I definitely recommend this mount!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Keener

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION !!! Only fits a couple VESA configs
customer_reviews.text: Even though this product claims to mount up to 400x400mm VESA, it does not fit all configurations. In my instance, I needed a 300x200mm configuration. My suggestion is to buy this mount instead: The mount I suggest above will fit 400x400mm/400x300mm/400x200mm/300x300mm/300x200mm/200x200mm/200x100mm/100x100mm, is a similar price, and has a high review rating.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall Mount for Flat Screen TV
customer_reviews.text: Had several needs in mind for this mount - ease of installation - ability to see TV from several locations - ability to do installation by myself - usefulness of mount in case I should change my mind on installation location (what are the chance of that happening?) - fit for my older TV This mount is very high quality and exceeded each of the above expectations (don't know about the changing my mind thing, yet). Add to that prompt delivery, easy to follow instructions (yes, I read them before assembly!), more parts than needed, and options for mounting. Seems like a true winner to me!
customer_reviews.author: digidoc664

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, can go flat against the wall, great range of motion. A little stiff at first. Only reason I gave it 4 stars was because it didn’t contain the right size screws for the vesa system. It wasn’t a huge deal but I did have to make a trip to Lowe’s to get the correct size screws.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Great economical mount, inadequate engineering if you expect to move a 55" TV a lot on the arm.
customer_reviews.text: Basic installation, not as robust as some of the mounts on the market, so if you anticipate moving your TV a lot on the arm, I'd get something else, but it's a great and economical option if you need to extend your TV over something on or out from the wall with the 20" arm. It's a bit finicky in adjusting the levelness of the TV once installed as the system probably isn't engineered strong enough for my 55" TV, but once leveled out, it seems to perform well. Overall I am happy with this mount and the price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Kreider

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it -1 star I would. Used the mounting hardware it came with. I used this mount on a 50 inch vizo a light tv. It fell off wall broke the corner of tv , put a hole in floor,and huge holes in wall . Don't know if I'm going to try again ... take this thing off Amazon put this junk on ebay
customer_reviews.author: tom lacey

customer_reviews.title: I have not mounted this to the wall yet because ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not mounted this to the wall yet because our room remodel is not yet underway. However, I did mount the backplate to the TV and discovered that one of the two thumbscrews used to secure the TV to the arm is improperly machined and wobbles when screwed on. It makes me wonder what the overall quality of the product is. I will update this review after I mount the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce W.

customer_reviews.title: Works with TV's larger than 55"
customer_reviews.text: This went up really easy. I do have a confession--we are using our tv mount with a 70" TV and there are no issues. I was scared because this specifically says for tv's up to 55". However, upon further research I discovered the VESA and weight capacity were the most important things in choosing a tv mount. Our tv weighs 56 lbs and has a VESA of 400x400. So this was perfect. This is exactly what we were looking for and the price doesn't hurt either! I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: bgk

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mounting bracket and a great value
customer_reviews.text: This device is a great value, and I especially like the way it can articulate in multiple directions. I liked it so much I bought a second one for another TV. Both are 40 inchers, but I wouldn't hestitate to use it on a larger TV (up to the limit). Installation was simple and straightforward, and no special tools are required. I appreciate that they provide a cardboard template to help you mark and pre-drill holes, and the template was dead accurate. You can spend a lot more money on TV bracket, but there's no reason to do so when this one works so well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sojiro Mifune

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces and poor instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are awful and I absolutely could not figure out how to mount this, so I ended up paying someone to do it. It turned out that it was missing pieces, which is why I couldn't figure it out. I wasted $60 to have someone mount this when I could have done it myself with all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, might need other screws
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this himself and said the product was very high quality, and he thought the price was reasonable (especially when compared to electronic stores.) It held the TV securely. It was not too difficult to install; however, he did need to purchase different screws. Even though it came with a variety of screw sizes, none of them worked for our Magnavox TV.
customer_reviews.author: P. Childress

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 48" flat screen mounted using this cantilever mount. Installation initially looked overwhelming but it ended up very easy. Pro Tip: Buy a cheap stud finder and level as they will make your life easier. Great price compared to other mounts online. Fully extended from the wall, the TV can come much closer to us, making the TV look much bigger: this was an unexpected plus! If you found this review helpful please hit the button below, Thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: Dj

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery, easy set up. We have a 55" Samsung LED LCD TV (44lbs) and I wanted to get something I was confident would not only hold the weight, but also allow us to manuever the TV in any direction we wanted. This is much heaftier/stronger in person than it looks online, it is not cheaply made at all. Our walls are about 1" drywall and then brick (older house), so that thing is on there super snug. It won't be coming off any time soon, and we're very comfortable moving it around. You will not be disappointed in this product - we love it. It's sleek, simple, yet very strong. So happy we got it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Things that make you go hmmmm....
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad, but the fittings for this really made me as what the heck....there wasn't a single screw included that would work with my 32" Sharp TV. On the bright side this should be able to handle a much larger and heavier TV than the one I have mounted on it. It does have some extension arms specifically for that purpose, and the screws for those larger TV's may... or may not work... It's a little buyer beware which is really why I rank it as low as I do. The mount is well built and I'm pretty sure it weighs more than my 32" TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done!
customer_reviews.text: This wall mount is very adjustable and very well built. It is heavy and seems like it would be very long lasting. It fit the TV great although the directions for any size mounting that didn't utilize the "arms" were non-existent. My TV had a 200x200 pattern which did not use the extensions I mentioned but nowhere was this addressed. Overall simple to install once you figured out what to do. Forgiving too if you didn't manage to get the wall mount exactly level. Enough slack otherwise to get TV straight. The only thing I would change is to increase the amount of "tilt" to aim the TV downward, a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to mount on the wall
customer_reviews.text: I just mounted it yesterday for my LG 55LS4500 55" TV which weighs about 48.28 pounds (also be sure to plug in the power cord prior to mounting the back plane). It was easy to mount on the wall, but the arm that extends out bends slightly from the weight of the tv which is no big deal unless you stare at it instead of watching tv. I can't help but be nervous about the thumb screw thread slipping off because we didn't have to turn it much but it's holding. I do love how you can adjust it in any which way.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.

customer_reviews.title: in good condition. Installation was straight forward
customer_reviews.text: Bracket came quickly, in good condition. Installation was straight forward. The 4 mounting holes all line up on the one stud, making it very stable. I've seen other brackets where the two holes on top don't both fit on one stud, and one goes through sheetrock using an anchor. I much prefer all mounting screws going through the stud for more strength. The arms are long and flexible enough to let me mount the the 42' TV in a corner of the room nicely. Definitely recommend this mount, especially for mounting a tv in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: SJG

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Great for office, monitor, living room, live event equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Have two they may be different models but they look identical just one is larger, I believe this review is for the one with a 24" and the other one is with a 50" and both work awesome, Have sent many people to this product from seeing it in use and loving that it was as close to a true 180 degree viewing rotation you could get... The tilt is good enough. Is it bullet proof? Looks good, but I wouldn't over load it, Hang out it, it is a liquid crystal display, piece of glass, whatever the whole thing is fragile but it definitely does the job
customer_reviews.author: b s

customer_reviews.title: Screws did not fit my TV
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to mount my 40" TCL TV. Unfortunately the screws provided did not fit into the back of my TV. The VESA mount aligns properly, but my TV requires 4 M4x12 screws, which are not included. They have 5 other sizes, but all of them are too big. I wish I would have known this as I wouldn't have purchased it. The information provided made me think that I would not need to purchase any additional hardware, as it states it will fit TCL TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: it would be fine. For the price
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it five stars but I had to cut a couple holes for the cables to pass through for my 26" TV. Additionally, as with virtually all swivel mounts, you would be a fool use it for the maximum stated 55" TV; it's way too small for that. for 32" or maybe 42" at most, it would be fine. For the price, I'm happy to use it as a mount for a 26" TV for use as a monitor, and in that role it performs flawlessly and is ROCK SOLID.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ziemba

customer_reviews.title: Size wise it holds my TV wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV mount for a 55 inch Roku TV. The main aspects that attracted me to this product was the center surface mount. The stud in my wall was directly behind where I wanted the TV to be mounted and other products I've seen have a much wider distribution on the wall. The amount of movement that I get from my TV I can see it from anywhere in the adjoining rooms. Size wise it holds my TV wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and a very good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these so i could mount my grandmothers TV for her and was surprised how well made it was especially considering the price. I paid over $100 for a similar style from Best Buy and the swivel on that one loosened up over time so the TV tilted a bit. This one has no such problem and is a quarter of the price. Very easy to install if you are just a little handy. Very, very well made out of solid materials. I ended up buying a second one and replaced my crappy one from Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eric in CT

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this purchase. I was just about to spend 4 times as much on a mount at one of the major warehouse clubs. I'm so glad I didn't. This things is made as good or better than anything you can get at any retailer. My TV is not the lightest but this baby handles it with no problem. I told my wife I can't believe they can afford to sell something this nice for such a low price. Possible bargain of the year. You can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilson

customer_reviews.title: dose what it says it dose... and ...
customer_reviews.text: dose what it says it dose ... and its low price. only thing i could kinda complain about is some of the hinges where a bit stuff but not hard to adjust the tv and it stays in place... i live in california and ide trust the mounted tv in an earthquake
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mount for my 42 Samsung plasma, Angles and tilts exactly where i wanted it. High quality for a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of review reading for this purchase, And sadly the local stores charge a small fortune for wall mounts. For my 42in plasma Samsung. -Kit came with exact bolts and brackets -Hold the TV exactly how i want it. Slightly angled and tilted down. -Most important part is what your anchoring into. Find studs or use a piece of 3/4" plywood. Because improper wall anchoring is the only way this will fail
customer_reviews.author: Taylor's

customer_reviews.title: Awful installation...
customer_reviews.text: 1. This product was bowed making installation horrible. 2. The screws it came with were cheap. They would not screw into the stud without stripping (Yes, I drilled a prior hole as per the instructions.) Once stripped they were impossible to get out of the stud. 3. Now that the TV is on the wall... It is slightly crooked due to the bowing. It isn't my fault as I had leveled it. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS! The only reason I'm not returning it is that I can not get it off my wall without damaging the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I went ahead and mounted it and its pretty awesome. I was a bit nervous on getting the holes straight and finding my stud, I used a needle to make 2x sure i found a stud and its edges. By its design, I would NOT use toggle bolts, top bolts are in tension (pulling away from wall) and bottom in compression, which given the right distance away from your wayy, will punch a hole through drywall alone and eventuallu drop your tv. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy and I would have given it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sturdy and I would have given it 5 stars, except the hardware to attach the actual TV (Samsung 28" Smart TV) doesn't fit, we had to go looking for the screws that would fit. If you say it works for these sizes and manufacturers than the hardware that comes with it should fit, you shouldn't have to look for the right diameter screw and then have to cut it to fit the length
customer_reviews.author: Lana Sapojnik

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: When I went to install the unit, following the instruction and using the provided allen wrench I tried to remove the VESA plate. One of the screws immediately stripped due to very low quality metal in the screw. Unfortunately I bought 2 of these. Get a name brand and save your self the aggravation
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Good enough.
customer_reviews.text: I'd say good not great. I'm too afraid to pull it all the way out. The hinge that allows you to tilt the tv loosena over time no matter how much you tighten it. It also doesn't allow the tv to sit flush enough with the wall. If i could do it again I would probably not go with any arm unless I had a tiny tv. Tell you what though- despite what I don't like about it, it still works and works well enough for me to keep it. So mcuh cheaper than what you would buy in a store too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This product was more challenging to install, but it was perfect when I put my tv on it! The range of motion was perfect and not only does it move side to side, it tilts up and down for a better view if needed! This is definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Woody9311

customer_reviews.title: Great value - holding my 50inch plasma
customer_reviews.text: needed a mount that mounts on a single stud - this worked great. Just an FYI,when the tv is pushed back to the wall, it will not be centered on the stud/mounting point - it will set about 2-3 inches left or right of that depending on how you set it up. If your stud is exactly where you want your TV, you may be disappointed. The mount works as advertised, was easy to setup and is holding my 50 inch plasma securely in my basement. Sure beats paying a premium at your local big box store!
customer_reviews.author: R. Martini

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Would highly recommend! Don't pay over $100 buying anywhere else for the same product, this is what you want.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a phenomenal price! Would definitely buy again when i change my TV. It is very difficult to mount by yourself so grab help but after completed, it looks great and looks very well made. This can articulate in various ways making it ideal for me since my TV is mount and a corner and needs to move around for my viewing pleasure where ever I am seated.
customer_reviews.author: JmZ

customer_reviews.title: Solid product with minimalist design gives my TV the illusion of floating when viewed directly in front of me
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solid mount. Installation is easy; you have to drill 3 holes. Screws and wallplugs are provided. Screws of multiple size are provided for attaching your TV to this mount. Unfortunately, M4 screws are not in the package (my Panasonic 32" LCD uses M4 on its back). I had to use the screws from my projector mount. My TV now can be pivoted easily according to where I'm seated.
customer_reviews.author: Lor Kam Hoi

customer_reviews.title: Product change and not for the good
customer_reviews.text: They have changed the way these are built from 6 months ago. The tilt part is very weak and will not hold TV in one position, the bolt that holds it steady does not b.c. tighten, we had to replace 3 of 6 bracket bolts to make the bracket work properly . Not happy , I have been installing these TV brackets for two years. Quality has gone done, may look for.new TV bracket
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: The directions were easy to understand. I put it together in about 15 minutes. Great deal -- spent just around $30.00. My 55 inch LG looks great on the wall!
customer_reviews.author: Jason jacobs

customer_reviews.title: It works but had a hard time getting it to.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It was very hard to mount onto the back of my tv. It wasn't designed universally for all flat screens I don't think. With a bit of cleverness and hard work, we got it mounted, and it is secure, it's not coming off, but its very wobbly and when I pull it away from the wall, it's crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and holds my 32" flatscreen well. I was a little nervous mounting this on the wall and it holding my TV securely. The construction is good and not wobbly or squeaky. I can pull my TV in multiple directions without worrying about the whole thing coming down or becoming loose. It moves left to right and extends out from the wall quite a bit for multiple viewing angles. And for the price, this could not be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Installation was pretty easy. I went through the instructions a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mount a few years ago for our 49" Hitachi. Installation was pretty easy. I went through the instructions a couple times before I started. Most nerve wracking part was putting the bracket on the TV. Liked the mount so much we bought one for my son's new TV.
customer_reviews.author: CT Swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit all tvs
customer_reviews.text: This mount does worknin all tvs 55 inches toshiba smart tv, two of the arm match the back of the tv 2 are out my husband added 2 long screws and mount it with two legs check the pics
customer_reviews.author: Ericka Kee

customer_reviews.title: Solid Piece
customer_reviews.text: This is overall a really well built unit. Installation was pretty straight forward and there was plenty of caution about how to install it such that it won't fall and drop your TV on your cat. My only criticism is that the TV is not mounted directly in-line with the wall connection plate. If you find the center of your wall and screw in there, your TV will then be off by a few inches. I wish I would have known that before I finished the installation.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: VonHaus Ultra Slim Cantilever Swivel & Tilt
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the VonHaus Ultra Slim Cantilever Swivel & Tilt because it doesn't fit my 55" tv as advertised. Check the measurements before ordering. I have a 55" LG TV and the advertisement says 55" the box clearly states it supports up to 47". I'm waiting on the vendor to accept the tilt and refund. I did get a phone call from a live person looking to resolve the issue. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: DynaMike

customer_reviews.title: Good TV arm, though it required minor modification to attach my TV
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid, heavy-weight arm/mount for flat panel TVs. I mounted a 40" Sceptre to it and it should hold it up just fine. The only negative of this product so far is that the holes I needed to use on the bracket to mount to the VESA holes on the TV were not drilled out large enough. I needed to enlarge the four holes with a drill to get the bracket arms attached in the correct location for my 300x400mm mount locations. Only took a few minutes but it wasn't p[lug and p[lay like it should have been.
customer_reviews.author: Blayne

customer_reviews.title: Best TV mount.
customer_reviews.text: I now have 7 of these mounts.. 5 for my home and 2 for our cottage. They are very easy to mount, great qualilty, and offer complete access to the TV's for connections. We move the TV's occasionally between our home and cottage and from room to room. It takes me minutes to disconnect and move any TV. Since they all have the same mount system it's a piece of cake! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: William R Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says and is simple to install. ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and is simple to install. The only issue I had was that none of the supplied screws fit my TV. I was mounting a 32" Sony LED TV. It required M4 screws and this unit comes with M6 and larger, so off to Home Depot to remedy. Obviously I am retaining all the mounting hardware as I'm sure the mount will outlast the TV.
customer_reviews.author: George Antochy, COL (retired), USAR,

customer_reviews.title: SO close to being a 5!!
customer_reviews.text: This holds my 32" flatscreen very well, but I'm giving it a 4 instead of a 5 because of one thing. They included a LOT of screws and accessories, and it was well organized. However, even with all this material they did not include screws small enough to attach to my TV! I had to go to Home Depot and spend another $2 to get the parts I needed. It works great now, just wish they'd included one size smaller on screws for those of us mounting smaller televisions!
customer_reviews.author: A-A-RON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: MUST install on studs or on beams attached to studs. I would not even trust drywall screws with a TV over 40". EASY to install, but requires careful measuring because the vertical wall piece is NOT at the center of the TV - lay it out before marking measurements. Also, using your eyes and brain is easier for the attachments' configuration rather than using the diagrams. My 46" hangs perfectly and can be adjusted for viewing from many angles. SUPERB product.
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Stripped and screwed by this product
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the worst purchase I've made on Amazon. The screws for the arms have two be taken out first in order to assemble this - got 6 screws out easily, the last two would not come out for anything. Immediately got stripped. Spent the next hour trying to get the screws out so that we could replace them with our own. No luck. We tried pliers, hammers, we even tried to melt this screw off and saw the head off with a hand saw. It's like some sort of messed up joke. Sending this back and never buying anything from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fotinatos

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Very sturdy and solid The only negatives, are that bottom screw is always rather loose, thus TV goes out of horizontal alignment very easily. Also hinges do not move as easily as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Ilya P

customer_reviews.title: Great tv mount
customer_reviews.text: Has very good level of adjusment for viewing angles. You can put 3 of these on a wall and have a 3 monitor pc setup with 3 55" tv. You can extend forward, flat to the wall, swivel side to side, and tilt up and down. Feels like those monitors in a hospital. Can hold my 55" tv no problem.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dmac

customer_reviews.title: Designer Habitat Ultra Slim Cantilever Swivel & Tilt Wall Mount TV
customer_reviews.text: This (Designer Habitat Ultra Slim Cantilever Swivel & Tilt Wall Mount TV) works great. I bought it for my husbands 42" TV in his (man cave) garage. He mounted it on one of the 6x6 posts and he can turn it so as to watch it from one end of the garage or the other. (24 x40 garage) His only problem is he wishes he had put it up a little higher~Every one that comes in there eventually hits their head on the bottom of the TV. When he hits his~ I'm sure he'll raise it~! lol
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mount
customer_reviews.text: I mounted a 50" tv with this mount, and I love the result. The mount is highly adjustable and easy to install. My box didn't include the guide for the holes to be drilled. However, I traced the holes onto a piece of paper and installed it with no issues. I love that the mount installs into a single stud. I have not had any problems with the mount holding the tv angle - I tightened the bolt with the supplied allen wrench for it to keep the angle. It feels sturdy and durable. I would definitely purchase this brand of mount again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good product good range of motion for your TV on the wall
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a medium sized TV all the way up to an 80-inch. I now have a 55-inch hooked to it and it works awesome
customer_reviews.author: corey,spokane wa

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a single stud which is what I had above the fireplace. I've got a 25 lb 55" vizio mounted on it. Couple of tips. When you're screwing in the bolts after you drilled the pilot holes, make sure to have a phillips head that's a little larger so you don't strip the threads. I had an off center stud, so as other people have mentioned, do some measuring because it's a couple of inches off center from where you mount the plate on the TV to where it will be on your wall. Install wasn't bad even for someone with minimal handyness like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for one person to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, great range of motion, very sturdy and the price is great!! Also, I am able to install these and the TV by myself....easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Vigil

customer_reviews.title: This is worth the money......
customer_reviews.text: I read about 10 reviews on this product. 5 pros and 5 cons. I took into consideration that the different size TV's that were being used. I have a 42" and 32"tv. The heaviest is like 55lbs. Mounting was pretty simple. Directions straight forward. The one draw back is the tilt. As per other reviews you can go pick up a nut for the tilt bolt, that is not supplied, and get the tv set up the way you want it. Otherwise it will have a significant tilt to it. I purchased 2 wall mounts of them and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John MCGinty

customer_reviews.title: can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Love It! I would reccomend the single arm mount everyday all day. It is super sturdy and moves easily. I have a double arm mount that I bought for another tv that I will be replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great TV mount - poorly written directions
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Sturdy mount. Looks nice. I hung this in about 30 minutes by myself. Has a great template to drill the holes. The only downfall is the directions are very vague and mounting the plate to the TV. It has small pictures and you cant tell the reference on the pieces as to which way they go. Other than this , it is a great TV mount. i would purchase another. It is holding a 50" TV with no problems
customer_reviews.author: gkecorp

customer_reviews.title: This wall mount is awesome! I was a little hesitant because it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This wall mount is awesome! I was a little hesitant because it is very thin, but very sturdy. I definitely used some precaution though- I went to the hardware store and bought some toggle screws just to know it would stay bolted to the wall. It didn't take too long to hang up and my 36" tv stayed up there! I read some reviews saying that it tilted forward, but really, that's just a matter of tightening it to your liking. I can rotate my tv any way I want and like the idea of tucking my tv away if I wanted to. Great product and VERY cheap! Get it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable & well built all metal TV mount. The bolts and hardware alone can cost as much as the unit price. Works great on my 43'' TV but I needed to buy some bolts when mounted my 32'' TV because none of the included bolts fit the smaller holes on the 32inch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Tried & True

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality. But decent.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't put a super nice tv on this. It's decent so far, but I am suspect of the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Dealy McShoppins

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you your tv fits this mount tho.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied purchase. Looks great all the wall and the swivel is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Entertainment

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of these types of products I've tried. The directions were easy to follow although the font could be a bit bigger! I really like the decorative covers for the base and the cord management. Very nice touch. We had some trouble trying to figure out what the size of the mounting screw head is (it is metric). Not sure if I missed it in the directions. If not, it would be a good addition to the directions.
customer_reviews.author: HeyRenee

customer_reviews.title: Great mount!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mount! It installed easy and is well made. I love how it allows you to move you screen off the wall 20 inches or so and left to right about the same. We have a 40" screen on it and it will turn all the way 90 degrees apposed to the wall its mounted on. The tilt works for us because we leave it the same all the time but if i had to adjust it daily that would be a deal breaker because it has a screw knob that you would have to reach behind and turn to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Ezutguy

customer_reviews.title: Holds up my 47in Vizio wonderfully! love that I can swing it out to ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds up my 47in Vizio wonderfully! love that I can swing it out to almost 180 degrees and watch from my kitchen. I did have to screw this into a stud, which made it off center over my fireplace. But the extra security makes me more comfortable with weight of the TV. And the price is unbeatable! Definitely leaving this behind to the renters when I move (I own the house, and would rather them use this than put new holes in the wall trying to mount something else).
customer_reviews.author: ALS2908

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I made sure it had all of the articulating angles I needed it to have, prior to purchase. I have put it through its paces, it does what it was advertised to do. The 55 inch TV looks great in all positions.
customer_reviews.author: Philly_PA

customer_reviews.title: Great price, extremely easy to hook up and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price, extremely easy to hook up and very durable. Also we switched tv's with another in our home and it was simple to remove and put on a different model tv + size. I glady would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: BostonMama84

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We mounted our old flat screen in the bedroom when we bought a new one for the living room--This unit was easy to put up and very sturdy, and very flexible for viewing position and angle. Super price and quick delivery I shopped the big stores and the price was very good and was worried about holding the TV up about 8 feet--no problem for our 40 inch but with the single stud mounting I would want a double stud unit if I was to mount our 65inch on the wall Definitely we recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: G Shorb

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Nice tilt.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV mount. It is very heavy and sturdy. The tilt on it is plenty for normal operations. We did have to purchase metric sized screws that were not included at the hardware store, but they were easy to find. It is nice that the mount does not stick out from behind the TV. Makes the TV look like it is floating.
customer_reviews.author: SweetLena

customer_reviews.title: Simple single stud installation
customer_reviews.text: I used this to mount a 49 inch TV in my bedroom. Single stud mounting made this relatively easy and I was able to do it all myself. Great mounting system and good range of motion.
customer_reviews.author: MCW

customer_reviews.title: Great price, even better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Came as described packaged all snug and secure. Instructions and hardware was easy, and helpful for someone who's never mounted anything before. This is a great deal for a great mount. We use it for our 55' Seiki in a catty corner and tilted it down slightly. The TV is secure and happy in its new home. Whenever we upgrade or get a new TV I'll be sure to get this again.
customer_reviews.author: MixedGlitter

customer_reviews.title: definitely worth the money,
customer_reviews.text: definitely worth the money, only downside is you can turn the tv in a circular motion looking at it so you always have to take a step back to look and make sure its sitting horizontal when you move it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adjusts many different ways and is very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mount and comes with all imaginable hardware to mount a television. Honestly, I think the 4 lag screws were overkill in my application of a 32-in Samsung that weighs less than 10 lbs but I did it anyway. Don't hesitate to buy - this adjusts many different ways and is very heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: fullbirdmusic

customer_reviews.title: A Great Design and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: A great design at a great price. Well built and the kit comes with every type of fastener you might need. Instructions are well written and easy to follow. The TV is easy to adjust and installation was a breeze. When you look at the quality and price of this kit and compare it to similar items in a big box store you can easily understand why those stores are struggling. Don't get me started on the $30 HDMI cables!
customer_reviews.author: Mr J.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a sturdy bracket. When I received it there were a ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a sturdy bracket. When I received it there were a bunch of ball bearing like beads floating in the box. I couldn't see anywhere that would require any ball bearings and the product does not seem to be effected in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Galaxy

customer_reviews.title: great mount for the price jump on it!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT MOUNT for the price it was a little tricky to install because drill would not work on lag bolts but i just used a nut driver and 8 in wrench to tighten them down ans boom it was up nice and sturdy great angle for my 48 in tcl tv its only 40lbs so worked out great the negative is the round screws to tighten tv to mount should have come with extra bolts for more security but i will go to the hardware store for some 1$ bolts but great buy for anyone looking to mount a tv
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Very good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Very good price. I used Tapcon concrete screws instead of what came with the product to install it on my drywall - furring strip - cinder block wall. The screws that came with it are not long enough if you have furring strips and drywall over the masonry wall.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Payne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but be weary of plastic cover on textured walls
customer_reviews.text: Product is made nicely, holds up my tv without a problem. I like how the hardware is all labeled and packaged separately. My only reason for 4 stars is that I have textured Sheetrock, and the plastic covers for the wall mounting plate do not fit correctly against the texture of my wall. If you have flat painted walls, or any other perfectly flat mounting area, this would not be an issue, but hadn't seen this before on any reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Bell

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Was nervous to use this for our uber heavy 55 inch Samsung tv, but it ended up being perfect! Didn't require any major skill either. My boyfriend was very impressed how the nuts and bolts were packaged simply. No rocket science degree required. 5 star purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Great great product for the price. You can easily find yourself spending $100 on something like this... but this one is just as good. I mounted my 42" TV in my bedroom on this guy and installation was pleasant. I honestly couldn't even suggest an improvement, I'm proud of this purchase, and will continue to buy this item until they go away. (Great deals always seem to)
customer_reviews.author: Cool Hand Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outside on RV's
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to mount the outside TV on my motor home. There is very limited space where it is mounted on a stationary mount. This slim design worked out perfect. Many of the mounts I looked at caused the TV to be too far forward and not let the door close. This mount fit perfectly. Now I can pull my TV out and swivel it around so I can watch it from any location when outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gdaddy

customer_reviews.title: well designed, well engineered and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: So many TV brackets come with only wood screws to mount the bracket to the wall and I need to go get bolts to attach the bracket to the wall so that the screw heads don't "strip out". This bracket comes with screw/bolt head screws that I can use a ratchet on. It is light, versatile and inexpensive. The small plastic caps for cosmetically hiding the hardware are not very high quality but all in all that's a pretty minor factor for me.
customer_reviews.author: John A

customer_reviews.title: holds my 55 inch Samsung and I love that I can rotate the screen however I need
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about ordering this because of the low cost. You usually get what you pay for, but not in this case. This is so worth the price, holds my 55 inch Samsung and I love that I can rotate the screen however I need. Totally worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joell Nicole

product_meta.title: VonHaus Ultra Slim Cantilever Articulating Arm Swivel and Tilt Wall Mount TV Bracket for 26-55 Inch for LCD, LED, 3D, Plasma TVs. Load Capacity 88lb, 400x400 VESA
product_meta.description:
TV Size
26-55"

VESA
Minimum – 75mmx75mm (2.95”x2.95”)
Maximum - 400x400mm (15.7"x15.7")

Tilt
-15°

Swivel
180°

Load Capacity
88lb

Low Profile
2.2" from wall

Articulating Arm
Extends 20” from the wall

Compatible Televisions
Sony, Samsung, LG, Panasonic, Phillips, Toshiba, Sharp, Mitsubishi, Sanyo, JVC, Logik, Vizio, Seiki, TCL and much more!

All Fitting Hardware included:
4X M4*14
4X M4*25
4X M5*14
4X M5*25
4X M6*14
4X M6*25
4X M8*15
4X M8*30
4X Self Tapping Wall Screws
4X Plastic Wall Anchors
Assorted Washers
Assorted Plastic Spacers
4X Metal Shim Spacers
Allen Key

VESA Dimension is the most important specification when considering the best TV Bracket for your television. Please ensure your TV is compatible with this brackets MAX VESA 400x400mm (15.7"x15.7") by checking your TV's manual or by measuring the distance between the 4 holes on the rear of the television.
feature_bullets: Fits 26 to 55 inch TVs with VESA Compatibility of 75x75mm to 400x400mm
Tilt: -15. Swivel 180. 3 left & right screen adjustment
Quick and easy to install - bracket comes complete with full instructions and required fitting hardware

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,306 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
